title: Understanding CLASS™ for Teachers
desc: Understanding CLASS  is for teachers and anyone interested in understanding why effective interactions are so important for student learning and development. It provides foundational knowledge about the CLASS tool and the power of effective interactions.  ? Participants in this overview will gain an understanding of: ? ? Build comfort and familarity with the CLASS Tool? ? Discover connections between effective teacher-child interactions (as measured by the CLASS) and child outcomes ? Learn how CLASS domains and dimensions organize these interactions ? the types of strategies that can be used to enhance child interactions ? Review Fed eral Monitoring Proctocol for CLASS? ? ?
